Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class Commands

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.Commands
public class Commands extends Object
This class translates String Play commands to method calls, checking for data correctness, and fixing Case errors.

  • Method Details

    • receivedCommand

      public void receivedCommand(String command) throws IllegalStateException, NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      Called by the views to send Play type commands to the server

      The Accepted commands are: 

      
  Play commands:
     abbreviation    command      arg             arg     arg      : description
     as              assistant    weight                           : command used to play an assistant card
     sm              studentmove  student color   from id to id    : command to move a student
     mnm             mnmove       hops                             : command to move mother nature of x hops
     im              influence                                     : command to calc influence
     ch              choose       cloud id                         : command to choose a cloud

  Expert Play commands:
     abbreviation    command      arg           arg        arg        : description
     ca              character    character                           : command used to play an assistant card
     ca              character    character     color                 : command used to play an assistant card and give color preference
     ca              character    character     island id             : command used to play an assistant card and give island preference
     sm              studentmove  from color    to color   place id   : command to shift a student between entrance and place
      Parameters:
      command - the raw command received from the user.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - exception launched when the user writes wrongly a message - wrong arguments
      NoSuchMethodException - exception launched when the user writes wrongly a message - wrong command Class.getMethod(String, Class[])
      InvocationTargetException - exception launched when the user writes wrongly a message - wrong arguments or state Method.invoke(Object, Object...)
      IllegalAccessException - exception launched when the user writes wrongly a message - wrong command Method.invoke(Object, Object...)
